post.title: 'Change must come from within the community'

children.text: “Change must come from within the community, and that begins by holding those individuals that we elect accountable," said Rev. James Caldwell.

“Change must come from within the community, and that begins by holding those individuals that we elect accountable. With action and change, my community can grow and prosper, and quality of life of its residents can improve," said Rev. James Caldwell, who was born in Fifth Ward and has lived there the past 20 years.
